name: Minor Malleable
description: The Minor Malleable is an amorphous aberration that can change its form and shape while retaining a fleshy appearance. Its body is adaptable, allowing it to navigate tight spaces with ease.
memorable: It can absorb psychic damage, regaining health, and can combine with others to form larger, more dangerous entities.
goals: To absorb psychic energy and manipulate its surroundings, often teaming up with similar creatures.
relations: Related to other minor malleables; can fuse with them to create stronger variants.
environment: Likely found in dark or hidden places where it can surprise its victims.
strengths: Psychic immunity and the ability to absorb psychic damage makes it exceptionally resilient to attacks of this nature.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity impairs its agility and fleeing capabilities.
attacks: Uses a Flesh Tendril for bludgeoning damage, capable of grappling smaller targets, and Psychic Drain to weaken opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Psychic Absorption allows it to heal from psychic attacks, effectively making it a psychic predator.
senses: Blindsight up to 30 feet allows it to perceive its surroundings even in darkness.
additional_information: Can move through spaces as narrow as 1 inch due to its Amorphous trait.
Reverts to its original form after temporary shape changes.
Can collaborate with other minor malleables to increase threat levels.
Moderate damage potential with its Flesh Tendril and Psychic Drain attacks.
Has a uniquely chaotic evil nature fueling its actions.
test_queries: amorphous creature that absorbs psychic damage
malleable monster that can join others
